3: (Its arm jams as it raises its weapon) ...
Relax, I can still take on another dozen of you. So come at me, bro! Show me what you got! No one goes easy on me!
(Its power supply warning goes off while its frame lets out black smoke) ...
Although Roland got away, he couldn't have gone far in that state...
Not to mention he'd sent all the Corrupted he got trying to stop me...
Save me the trouble of hunting you all down one by one later! Let's put all you eggs into one basket, and let's get cracking!
(Wipes the gold dust from its blade barehanded) ...
That's more like it! Don't keep sending me minions!
(Shrugs off the arm from a fallen Corrupted) No wonder I'm sensing less gold dust in the air...
The minions were in charge of absorbing the glitter, weren't they? You're using them as a filter!
Oh, your kind doesn't really give a crap who lives or dies, do you?
Yeah, yeah, I know. Here I come to kick your ass!
